item.title: EP 610 - Can K-Pop Save The World?
item.itunes:title: Can K-Pop Save The World?
item.description:
Today we investigate if K-Pop can save the world, and then we travel to Morocco to uncover a series of horrible crimes!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Links:

NORTH KOREA WEEK EPISODES

EP 434 - Pulgasari: North Korea's Monster Movie Made At Gunpoint

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-434-pulgasari-north-koreas-monster-movie-made-at-gunpoint

EP 435 - The Demon Of Spreyton

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-435-the-demon-of-spreyton

EP 436 - The Cryptids Of North Korea

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-436-the-cryptids-of-north-korea

EP 437 - Is North Korea Powered By Meth?

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-437-is-north-korea-powered-by-meth

EP 438 - Is North Korea A Sci Fi Utopia?

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-438-is-north-korea-a-sci-fi-utopia

Wonder Girls - Like Money ft. Akon

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=quE6Cq4Q2bs&list=WL&index=244&t=208s&ab_channel=WonderGirlsVEVO

Can North Korea Handle a K-Pop Invasion?

https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/30/world/asia/north-korea-k-pop-red-velvet.html

For young North Koreans, K-pop provides an awakening — and an inspiration to defect

https://www.seattletimes.com/nation-world/for-young-north-koreans-k-pop-provides-an-awakening-and-an-inspiration-to-defect/

Music of North Korea

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music_of_North_Korea#Pop_music

Red Velvet 레드벨벳 '빨간 맛 (Red Flavor)' MV

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WyiIGEHQP8o&feature=emb_title&ab_channel=SMTOWN

May I have a word about… the demystification of Kim Jong-un

https://www.theguardian.com/theobserver/commentisfree/2020/may/31/may-i-have-a-word-about-the-demystification-of-kim-jong-un

Chukjibeop

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chukjibeop

Teagirl

https://www.spirit-of-metal.com/en/band/Teagirl

Zouhri Child: Key of hidden treasures!

https://www.kabbos.com/en//54/articles/zouhri-child-key-of-hidden-treasures

Zouhri Children and Witchcraft: Morocco’s Darkest Beliefs

https://www.moroccoworldnews.com/2013/09/103129/zouhri-children-and-witchcraft-moroccos-darkest-beliefs/

Morocco: Stories of Abduction Plague “Zouhri” Children

https://www.moroccoworldnews.com/2014/12/146820/morocco-stories-of-abduction-plague-zouhri-children/

Hair whorl

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_whorl

Hair whorl: The myth

https://udel.edu/~mcdonald/mythhairwhorl.html

Jinn: A Creature Made of Smokeless Fire

https://islamwich.com/2013/05/29/a-creature-made-of-smokeless-fire/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
